sense.def:
A wish
je želja, da bi nekaj imeli.

seg.quote: She told me of her wish to leave the convent.

sense.def:
To wish to do something
pomeni želeti si, da bi nekaj storili;

seg.quote: They are in love and wish to marry.

sense.def:
To wish that something were the case
pomeni želeti si, da bi bilo nekaj tako, kot je povedano, čeprav je nemogoče ali malo verjetno.

seg.quote: I often wish that I were really wealthy.

sense.def:
To wish someone something
pomeni nekomu povedati o svojem upanju, da bo nekaj imel, na primer srečo.

seg.quote: They wished each other luck before the exam.

sense.def:
To send someone one's good wishes
pomeni pokazati svoje upanje, da bo nekdo srečen in uspešen.

Izraz
wishes
uporabljamo v besednih zvezah, kot sta
best wishes
ali
with all good wishes
na koncu neuradnih pisem, preden se podpišemo.
